overview:
Ezgi Cetin is a video game designer and developer.

Having a passion for video games from early ages, she decided to pursue a career in the field. With her friends she founded Conosour Games as a startup within Viveka Incubation.

After a year of develeping a tower defence game, having different visions about the sector she founded a new startup called Galavalomka Games. She’s been involved with Galavalomka Games to the date.
